Question: In the movie 'Kapoor & Sons' released in 2016, what role does Rishi Kapoor play?
Options:
A. He plays the father of the male leads.
B. He plays the grandfather of the male leads.
C. He plays the uncle of the male leads.
D. He plays a family friend.
Answer: He plays the grandfather of the male leads.
